yellow-stripe.english: Walking stance low block, rising block
Walking stance outer forearm low block, reverse punch

yellow.english: Right walking stance straight fingertip thrust
Walking stance outer forearm wedging block
Walking stance outer forearm high block, reverse middle punch

green-stripe.english: Right turning kick, L-stance guarding block
green-stripe.korean: Dollyo chagi, niunja sogi-polmok daebi makgi

green-stripe.english: Back piercing kick, L-stance guarding block
green-stripe.korean: Dwit cha jirugi, niunja sogi-palmok daebi makgi

green-stripe.english: Bending stance, side kick, L-stance guarding block

green.english: Left walking stance palm high hooking block, hooking block, obverse punch
green.korean: Gunnon sogi, Sonbadak nopunde golcho makgi, golcho makgi, baro jirugi

green.english: Walking stance X-fist pressing block, twin vertical punch
green.korean: Gunnon sogi-kyocha joomuk noollo makgi, Sang sewo jirugi

green.english: Walking stance double forearm high block

blue-stripe.english: Left low stance palm pressing block
L-stance knifehand guarding block, footshift to Walking stance upper elbow strike
blue-stripe.korean: Niunja sogi-sonkal daebi makgi, jajun bal, gunnon sogi-wi palkup taerigi

blue-stripe.english: L-stance double step, knifehand guarding block. (Change stance)
blue-stripe.korean: Ibo omgyo didigi Niunja sogi-sonkal daebi makgi

blue-stripe.english: Reverse turning kick, then perform an L-stance forearm guarding block
blue-stripe.korean: Bandae dollyo chagi, niunja sogi-palmok daebi makgi

blue-stripe.english: Walking stance arc hand high strike

blue.english: Moving on left leg, sitting stance W-shape block
Downward kick then perform an L-stance guarding block
blue.korean: Naeryo chagi, niunja sogi-palmok daebi makgi

blue.english: L-stance low knifehand block, footshift, walking stance circular block
blue.korean: Niunja sogi-najunde sonkal makgi, jajun bal, gunnon sogi-dollimyo makgi

blue.english: Side kick, back kick, walking stance reverse punch, footshift, guarding block
blue.korean: Yop cha Jirugi, Dwitcha Jirugi, gunnon sogi-bandae jirugi, jajun bal, palmok daebi makgi

blue.english: Turning kick, reverse turning kick, walking stance reverse knifehand high reverse strike
blue.korean: Guard Dollyo chagi, bandae dollyo chagi, gunnon sogi-sonkal dung nopunde taerigi, jajun bal, palmok daebi makgi

blue.english: L-stance side backfist and a low outer forearm block
blue.korean: Niunja sogi-yop dung joomuk, najunde bakat palmok makgi

red-stripe.english: From right L-stance guarding block, front kick off front leg, turning kick off the back leg
Front kick, side kick with the same leg
Sliding into fixed stance side punch, then pull back into vertical stance downward knifehand strike
red-stripe.korean: Mikulgi-gojong sogi-yop jirugi, soojik sogi-naeryo sonkal taerigi

red-stripe.english: Walking stance punch, grab hand, release with side kick, perform an L-stance knifehand strike
red-stripe.korean: Gunnon sogi-baro jirugi, jappyolsol tae, yop chagi, niunja sogi-sonkal taerigi

red-stripe.english: Front leg, hooking kick, side kick, then using back leg, crescent kick, side kick, L-stance guarding block
red-stripe.korean: Golcho chagi, yop chagi, bandal chagi, yop chagi, niunja sogi-palmok daebi makgi

red-stripe.english: Double step side kick. To change stance perform a single step
Double step turning kick. To change stance perform a single step

red.english: Right L-stance guarding block, hooking kick, side kick off the front leg, reverse turning hooking, kick off the back leg
red.korean: Golcho chagi, yop chagi, bandae dollyo goro chagi

red.english: Walking stance knifehand high front strike bringing back hand in front of the head
Flying side kick in a double stepping motion, knife hand guarding block
red.korean: Twimyo yop chagi, niunja sogi-sonkal daebi makgi

red.english: Turning kick, reverse turning kick, turning kick on the same leg
red.korean: Dollyo chagi, bandae dollyo chagi, dollyo chagi

red.english: Walking stance twin palm upward block
L-stance guarding block, double step hooking kick off the front leg. To change stance perform, a single step
red.korean: Ibo omgyo didigi, bandae dollyo goro chagi

red.english: Sitting stance middle front outer forearm block and then a high side backfist
red.korean: Annun sogi-kaunde ap bakat palmok makgi, nopunde yop dung joomuk

red.english: Front kick, downward kick on the same leg
Flying front kick off the back leg
